ygData.msgSnippet: (Phobia already shot at Waspinator) Phobia sees the Lavacons open fire on Hellbeast. he backs away to avoid thier rapid assault. Starscream, what have you

(Phobia already shot at Waspinator) 

Phobia sees the Lavacons open fire on Hellbeast. he backs away to 
avoid thier rapid assault. "Starscream, what have you gotten us 
into?" he yells trying to be heard above the fire.

Lunarpine rushes over to Ramulus to see if he's alright, he wants to 
persue Slayer but knows he has to get back to Veratis with Shadow 
Wings DNA. he kneels at Ramulus' side and checks for damage. He turns 
toward the nearest Maximal (Whomever it may be) "Help me get Ramulus 
back to the Ark, he needs immediate medical attention."

Foxfingers finds his way to the weapons storage facility onboard the 
Cybertronian Fire. The code was incripted for use by certain bots 
only. He checked the system carefully trying to resist his function 
as a thief. His programming won out. "I won't take anything, I'll 
just see if I still have the old touch. " He removed a set of relays 
from his side pockets, switched his vision to infr red to track the 
energy input. He placed a relay on each side of the alarm circuit so 
he wouldn't trip anything. He studied the console before removing a 
pair of tweezer sized grips from his wrist compartment. The sly fox 
tapped each wire trying to find the hotwire. Foxfingers rerouted the 
hotwire to the locking mechanism shorting out both. the door creaked 
a little as it slid open. "I still got it " He thought."While I'm 
here I might as well look inside.
